title.rendered: 12 Must-Follow Blogs On Robotic Process Automation

content.rendered:
Robotic Process Automation is the new trend in the market lately. Robotic process automation (RPA) is a software technology that makes creating, management consulting firms, and managing software robots smooth and easy; these processes imitate humans’ actions interacting with digital systems and software. Since technology is an ever-changing element, one should keep track of the latest advancements in robotic process automation. But how can you do so?

One way is to read the trendy and trustworthy blogs covering all the essential information and updates regarding robotic process automation. For example, Concat has a blog on robotic process automation. Still, apart from them, we have compiled a list of blogs on robotic process automation that have credibility and should be added to your reading list.

Here is a compiled list of 12 blogs on robotics process automation that one should add to their reading list.

1. Skcript x RPA

https://www.skcript.com/automation

Skcript’s blogs on robotic process automation highlight the basics of RPA for you. It covers the why, when and how to implement Robotic Process Automation in your company along with real-world use-cases to deepen the knowledge about RPA’s impact.

2. UiPath

https://www.uipath.com/blog

Uipath blogs cover all the essential topics that one needs to know about Robotic Process Automation. In addition, Uipath offers a collection of quality examples, detailed documentation, a digital plan of action, and even tutorials on RPA.

3. Automation Edge

Automation edge provides you with the platform to keep up to date with the latest marketing trends of robotic process automation and other automation in the industry. In addition, it covers the statistics by sharing a quality collection of stats, market reports, applications, virtual CTO services, etc.

4. Automation Anywhere

https://www.automationanywhere.com/in/blog

Automation Anywhere has a series of blogs on benefits, new trends, applications of robotic process automation. They have classified their blogs that facilitate the readers to read what they want. 

5. Perficient

https://blogs.perficient.com/tag/rpa/

Perficient blogs provide you with the short and crisp, to the point kind of blog content. Even though the content is small, you will find all the necessary information and data to learn about robotic process automation and HR outsourcing companies. 

6. Forrester Research

https://go.forrester.com/blogs/category/robotic-process-automation-rpa/

Forrester research provides you with blogs that include information about robotic process automation predictions for the year. Forrester Research also has blogs with use cases along with the prediction reports.

7. The RPA Academy

https://therpaacademy.com/blog/

RPA Academy focuses on the business aspect of robotic process automation. RPA academy posts all its blogs on a single page so that the readers get to read all the topics without missing out on any.

8. Sutherland Global

https://www.sutherlandglobal.com/search-results?query=RPA

Sutherland Global offers whitepapers that explain RPA implementation in diverse fields like mortgage companies and insurance. Along with that, they also have a quality collection of blogs that will give you have a better understanding of RPA.

9. HFS Research

https://www.horsesforsources.com/category/robotic-process-automation

HFS Research firm offers accurate information about RPA. They have reports which are insightful and illuminating. 

10. Apex Systems

https://apex.blog/data-integration-and-process-automation-386efa3bb2cb

Apex systems firm is helping people cut in on the RPA market. Their blogs explain data integration and process automation briefly. The blogs also mention the latest marketing trends in robotic process automation.

11. KPMG

https://home.kpmg/us/en/home/insights/2017/10/robotic-process-automation-case-studies-for-tech-companies.html

KPMG is one of the top three global suppliers of Robotic Process Automation. They provide the best-case studies and white papers on RPA and its market.

12. BluePrism

https://www.blueprism.com/resources/blog

Blue Prism are the colonists in RPA software development. They have an excellent knowledge resource which includes case studies, videos, webinars, whitepapers, and blogs.
